pullrequest.title: Fix for finding correct local ip

content.raw:
By ignoring all 127.0 addresses, I don't think that this will work on a machine that has *only* a loopback interface. If you bring down your other network interfaces, I expect that this function will return an empty address, not allowing any communication, even on the local machine.

Instead, we should prefer to use a non-local address, but be willing to fall back on a local address.  If no address at all can be found, then it should be a loud and fatal error.

By ignoring all 127.0 addresses, I don't think that this will work on a machine that has only a loopback interface. If you bring down your other network interfaces, I expect that this function will return an empty address, not allowing any communication, even on the local machine.

Instead, we should prefer to use a non-local address, but be willing to fall back on a local address. If no address at all can be found, then it should be a loud and fatal error.
